description: Amelia C. Voght is a Marvel Comics character, associated with the X-Men franchise.A mutant with the ability to turn her body into mist, Amelia was a love interest of Professor X before he founded the X-Men. Unable to believe in his mission, she eventually joined Magnetoâ€™s Acolytes, becoming one of Magneto's most trusted lieutenants.
name: Amelia Voght
powers: matter around her into a mist-like state.
